body:
@vrv Gives me the following output:
`Device mapping:
/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0 -> device: 0, name: GeForce GTX 950M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0
Const: /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0
Identity: /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0
x: /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0
gradients/L2Loss_grad/mul: /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0
L2Loss: /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0`

L2Loss on the CPU, this is with `use_gpu=True`. Any hints as to where I should dig for this?
